solution_line_template: If Lydia has {lydia_bananas} bananas, and Dawn has {dawn_more_than_lydia} more, then Dawn has {lydia_bananas}+{dawn_more_than_lydia} = <<{lydia_bananas}+{dawn_more_than_lydia}={dawn_bananas}>>{dawn_bananas} bananas.
The total number of bananas Dawn and Lydia have is {dawn_bananas}+{lydia_bananas} = <<{dawn_bananas}+{lydia_bananas}={dawn_lydia_total}>>{dawn_lydia_total} bananas.
